markdownRemark.html:
Just a short blog.

After posting my ideas about climate change, I refocused again think hard of my plans for the near future. That is how I made my way out of a depressed state and looked better in the future again. I try not to predict too much as one decision of another intelligent life form like Donald Trump (or not that intelligent) can alter and create tremendous uncertainty for mankind.

I will have to go back studying. Yes, that is my ultimate antidote to chaos. And honestly, if you remain static or fail to upgrade your brain… your life won’t hardly change at all.

After I get a job overseas..I will be enrolling to Singularity University. I consider the next two to three years my sandbox period for learning what the future holds.

I will continue to advocate for climate change awareness as well as this is the biggest deterrent of our future as it will pushback our progress a thousand of years again. Scientists predicts that if we happen to figure out solutions to climate change, creation of evironmental friendly energy resources, rising complexity of technology and the role artificial intelligence.
